actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a postage stamp to commemorate the 200th anniversary of the election of John Hanson of Maryland as first President of the United States in Congress Assembled.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative postage stamp to honor the two hundredth anniversary of the election of John Hanson of Maryland as first President of the United States in Congress Assembled. Provides that such stamp shall be first placed on sale on November 5, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a postage stamp to commemorate the 200th anniversary of the election of John Hanson of Maryland as first President of the United States in Congress Assembled.
